elements.label: Metallic Cylinder
elements.description: A Metallic Cylinder. Its surface is covered in beautiful stamps. Dozens of them. The note on it says: She Carries Torch, Key and Quill where the night is darkest

slots.description: Do I ask for a worldly payment with my Half-Heart, or with intel for further mysteries with my Lack-heart

elements.label: Metallic Cylinder
elements.description: A Metallic Cylinder. A little note added here says: "This one traveled to a number of locations already. The previous carrier somehow tried to deliver it to a series of wrong addresses, claiming 'it was the right one this time and to take it before the address changes again', according to some reports." The note on it says: Bane of Reims, Fear of Aspirants
